**Wikipedia summary**:  
<p class="mw-empty-elt">
</p>

<p><i><b>Cornus sericea</b></i>, the <b>red osier</b> or <b>red-osier dogwood</b>, is a species of flowering plant in the family Cornaceae, native to much of North America. It has sometimes been considered a synonym of the Asian species <i>Cornus alba</i>. Other names include <b>red brush, red willow</b>, <b>redstem dogwood</b>, <b>redtwig dogwood, red-rood, American dogwood, creek dogwood</b>, and <b>western dogwood</b></p>...
